Html:
Hi,

Looking for any real world feedback on how using the 'combine javascript output into file' option affects project compilation speed as the project gets large. I want to make sure that our Edit/Compile/F5 loop remains performant event after we have 1000's of js files.

Thanks

Matt B.
That flag is only about how your TypeScript code is emitted. It shouldn't affect the performance of language service features for TypeScript files.
